Description: Recently renovated unit. 4BR + study/Office space. Stainless steel appliances including disposal and range hood, granite countertops. 2 full bathrooms. Eat in kitchen. Good size bedrooms. Coin-op./Card-op Laundry in basement. Off street parking available. 9 min walk Davis Sq, 11 min to Porter Sq, 10 min to Alewife T. Bus stop directly in front of Building.
